IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

I love this show.\n\nOverall the show is excellent and highly recommended. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. I love this show.\n\nOverall the show is excellent and highly recommended. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. programme.title: Como Não Esquecer
programme.desc: Molly é uma empregada de mesa solitária que se envolve com Gus, um vendedor de joias. Mas há um obstáculo para o relacionamento: Gus sofre de um problema de perda de memória recente, que o impede de se lembrar dela. No entanto, com criatividade e jogo de cintura, vão tentar fazer o amor triunfar.

programme.title: Stranded in Paradise
programme.desc: Após perder o seu importante emprego, Tess Nelson, uma executiva de direitos humanos, viaja para Porto Rico na tentativa de recuperar a sua carreira numa conferência de negócios. Porém, a viagem torna-se um desastre quando um furacão ameaça atingir o local. Mas é aí que Tess conhece Carter...

programme.title: Summer Love
programme.desc: Maya, que voltou à universidade, vai estagiar para uma empresa de prestígio. A transição do curso de Contabilidade para o mundo da tecnologia não é fácil, já que Maya não sabe nada sobre aplicações sociais. Para complicar um pouco mais as coisas, dois executivos começam a competir pelo seu amor.

programme.title: The Makeover - O Candidato
programme.desc: Adaptação do romance "Pigmaleão" de Bernard Shaw, este filme conta a história de Hannah, uma mulher inteligente e dedicada à carreira política, mas que não consegue nenhuma eleição. Decidida a não ter mais um fracasso, resolve transformar um bruto vendedor de cerveja em candidato ao Congresso.

programme.title: Love on a Limb
programme.desc: Quando o presidente da Câmara contrata um jardineiro bem-parecido para cortar um carvalho, que era adorado pela cidade, Aimie assume a missão de o salvar e acorrenta-se à árvore. Entretanto, o jardineiro tenta tirá-la de lá, e os dois percebem que a árvore lhes traz mais do que poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: Winter Castle
programme.desc: No casamento de inverno da irmã, que ocorre num hotel gelado, o coração de Jenny derrete-se pelo padrinho. O problema é que, inesperadamente, ele trouxe uma acompanhante, o que parece deitar as suas esperanças de um romance de inverno por água abaixo.

programme.title: Stalked By My Doctor: The Return
programme.desc: O Dr. Beck salva uma jovem adolescente de um afogamento no México. O médico, que entretanto mudou de nome, acaba por se apaixonar pela jovem mas, mais uma vez, surgem algumas complicações no seu caminho.

programme.title: Favores Arriscados
programme.desc: Kara é uma universitária que se vê envolvida num círculo de jovens que leva uma vida de luxo, financiada por encontros com homens mais velhos. Mas quando uma dessas raparigas desaparece, Kara vai colocar a sua vida em risco para descobrir a verdade.

programme.title: Bottled With Love
programme.desc: Depois de ter sido deixada pendurada, Abbey sente-se inspirada a escrever o que sente numa carta, colocá-la numa garrafa e atirá-la ao mar. Meses mais tarde, um homem que estava a pescar encontra-a e decide entrar em contacto.

programme.title: Jogos Perigosos
programme.desc: Emily tira uma licença sem vencimento para ficar com a sua família e acaba por conhecer a nova vizinha, uma mãe solteira que se muda com os dois filhos para a casa do lado. Quando estranhos eventos ocorrem, ela suspeita que a mulher maltrata os meninos. Porém, a verdade vai muito além disso...

programme.title: Ms. Matched
programme.desc: Libby Boland, uma organizadora de casamentos de sucesso, encontra a sua alma gémea quando conhece um conselheiro financeiro numa exposição sobre casamentos. No entanto, Ben aconselha os casais a pouparem dinheiro, em vez de organizarem uma grande festa...

programme.title: Grey's Anatomy
Anatomia de Grey
programme.desc: Grey's Anatomy: Created by Shonda Rhimes. With Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgwNGNkZGYtMWQyYS00YjEzLWFmZTctODUzYWMxOWJkNTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! It's great for marathon viewings!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":270305,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! It's great for marathon viewings!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":270305,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Rob Corn, Kevin McKidd, Debbie Allen, Chandra Wilson, Jeannot Szwarc
Category: Drama|Romance|Drama|Romance
https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgwNGNkZGYtMWQyYS00YjEzLWFmZTctODUzYWMxOWJkNTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Uma Sogra de Fugir
programme.desc: Após anos à procura do "tal", Charlotte encontra finalmente o homem dos seus sonhos, para depois descobrir que Viola, a sogra, é o pior dos seus pesadelos. Recentemente despedida, teme perder o seu filho da mesma forma que perdeu a carreira. Portanto, está determinada a afugentar a noiva do filho!

programme.title: Assassinos Natos
programme.desc: Mickey e Mallory, um casal com uma paixão por homicídios, embarcam numa matança, conseguindo 50 mortos antes de serem apanhados. A cobertura é feita pelo jornalista de um canal de televisão, sedento de manchetes escandalosas.

programme.title: Drive - Risco Duplo
programme.desc: Driver é um condutor profissional de automóveis de Los Angeles, duplo para produções cinematográficas durante o dia e motorista para bandos de assaltos à mão armada durante a noite. Apesar de ser um solitário por natureza, não consegue deixar de se apaixonar pela sua bela vizinha Irene.

programme.title: Rocky Marciano
programme.desc: A história de Rocky Marciano, que consegue contrariar o preconceito enraizado contra ítalo-americanos para se tornar no único campeão mundial incontestável de pesos pesados.

programme.title: Ases pelos Ares 2
programme.desc: Topper é encontrado a trabalhar como "faz tudo" num mosteiro budista. Já o seu incompetente ex-comandante está na Casa Branca. Mas, quando os iraquianos capturam um grupo de americanos, há uma missão de resgate que deve ser cuidadosamente preparada e Topper é homem ideal para o serviço!

programme.title: Beirute - O Resgate
programme.desc: Em 1982, um ex-diplomata americano, Mason Skiles, agora um alcoólatra que trabalha como mediador, vê-se de regresso à cidade que abandonou 10 anos antes: Beirute. Aí, terá de negociar pela vida de um amigo que deixou para trás...

programme.title: Efeito Borboleta
programme.desc: Um estudante universitário descobre que possui o poder de revisitar certos acontecimentos do seu passado, o que lhe possibilita mudar o curso da sua vida.

programme.title: Kill Bill - A Vingança Vol. 1
programme.desc: Uma assassina profissional sofre, no dia do seu casamento, o ataque de alguns membros da sua própria banda, que obedecem às ordens de Bill, o chefe da organização criminal. Depois de quatro anos em estado de coma, a "Noiva" acorda dominada por um profundo desejo de vingança.

programme.title: Kill Bill - A Vingança Vol. 2
programme.desc: Já com dois nomes riscados na sua lista, A Noiva está de volta para tratar de Budd e Elle Driver, os únicos sobreviventes do bando de assassinos que a traiu quatro anos antes. Tudo se conjuga para o confronto final com Bill, o antigo mestre da Noiva e o responsável pela ordem do seu assassinato.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: A história de Rocky Balboa, um pugilista falhado de Filadélfia a quem é dada uma segunda oportunidade. No entanto, a missão parece ser impossível: concorrer ao título de campeão de pesos pesados.

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Depois de vencer o campeão Apollo Creed, os fãs querem a desforra! No entanto, Rocky sofreu ferimentos graves e afastou-se dos ringues, estando a sua atenção toda virada para Adrian. Porém, o chamamento do ringue é mais forte e, quando Apollo o pressiona para um combate, Rocky regressa aos treinos.

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: A vida de Rocky não poderia estar a correr melhor. É adorado por milhões de fãs, já vence há 10 combates consecutivos e é apoiado por grandes patrocinadores. Porém, quando Clubber Lang o derrota com um knockout de forma humilhante, torna-se evidente que o campeão perdeu a sua garra.

programme.title: 12 Desafios
programme.desc: No dia em que o detetive Danny Fisher consegue impedir Miles de fugir com milhões de dólares, a namorada deste é morta acidentalmente. Quando sai da prisão, o criminoso põe em marcha o seu plano de vingança: sequestra e ameaça matar a mulher de Danny caso este não resolva 12 desafios.

programme.title: Polícia Sem Lei
programme.desc: Terence McDonagh fica com as costas seriamente afetadas ao salvar um prisioneiro, na sequência do furacão Katrina. Entretanto, prescrevem-lhe analgésicos para aguentar a dor e poder voltar ao seu posto. Um ano depois, está viciado em Vicodin e em drogas duras, vivendo em constante convulsão moral.

programme.title: Atracção Fatal
programme.desc: Dan Gallagher tem uma vida perfeita, até arriscar tudo quando conhece Alex. No entanto, o que começa por ser um arrebatador e louco fim de semana acaba num pesadelo de violência e falsidade quando Alex recusa ser rejeitada.

programme.title: Assassinos Natos
programme.desc: Mickey e Mallory, um casal com uma paixão por homicídios, embarcam numa matança, conseguindo 50 mortos antes de serem apanhados. A cobertura é feita pelo jornalista de um canal de televisão, sedento de manchetes escandalosas.

programme.title: Assassinos
programme.desc: Robert Rath, um assassino profissional de meia-idade, quer deixar a atividade e não mais ouvir falar nela. Contudo, ele torna-se o alvo de Bain, o psicótico assassino seu protegido, que ambiciona ser como ele.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: A história de Rocky Balboa, um pugilista falhado de Filadélfia a quem é dada uma segunda oportunidade. No entanto, a missão parece ser impossível: concorrer ao título de campeão de pesos pesados.

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Depois de vencer o campeão Apollo Creed, os fãs querem a desforra! No entanto, Rocky sofreu ferimentos graves e afastou-se dos ringues, estando a sua atenção toda virada para Adrian. Porém, o chamamento do ringue é mais forte e, quando Apollo o pressiona para um combate, Rocky regressa aos treinos.

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: A vida de Rocky não poderia estar a correr melhor. É adorado por milhões de fãs, já vence há 10 combates consecutivos e é apoiado por grandes patrocinadores. Porém, quando Clubber Lang o derrota com um knockout de forma humilhante, torna-se evidente que o campeão perdeu a sua garra.

programme.title: Polícia Sem Lei
programme.desc: Terence McDonagh fica com as costas seriamente afetadas ao salvar um prisioneiro, na sequência do furacão Katrina. Entretanto, prescrevem-lhe analgésicos para aguentar a dor e poder voltar ao seu posto. Um ano depois, está viciado em Vicodin e em drogas duras, vivendo em constante convulsão moral.

programme.title: Em Plena Forma
programme.desc: Pouco depois da Segunda Guerra Mundial, um lutador de boxe dos EUA é levado para Okinawa para se preparar para um combate transmitido internacionalmente contra um lutador japonês. Os dois acabam por entrar numa batalha que irá testar os derradeiros limites do espírito humano.

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: Rocky acompanha Apollo Creed num combate contra o gigantesco pugilista russo Ivan Drago. Mas Drago é demasiado forte e Creed acaba por morrer no ringue. Rocky sente-se culpado pela morte do amigo e decide vingar-se, pelo que viaja para a Rússia, onde irá treinar para o brutal combate final.

programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: Depois de derrotar o russo Ivan Drago, Rocky é forçado a abandonar os ringues por causa dos ferimentos sofridos. No regresso a casa, descobre que o seu gestor perdeu toda a sua fortuna na bolsa e desapareceu, obrigando-o a mudar-se para o seu antigo bairro.

programme.title: Southpaw - Coração de Aço
programme.desc: Depois de uma tragédia transformar a sua vida num pesadelo, o pugilista Billy Hope decide recuperar tudo o que perdeu. Procura então a ajuda de um ex-campeão que se dedica a treinar pugilistas amadores. Billy entra, assim, no mais difícil combate da sua vida.

programme.title: O Meu Pai e Eu
programme.desc: Anthony, de oito anos, vai passar um fim de semana com o pai, Walt, que tem problemas de alcoolismo. O rapaz não sabe o que esperar e o pai sente-se inseguro. Os dois dão início a um processo de reaproximação que já nenhum deles julgava possível...

programme.title: Lovelace
programme.desc: Muito antes da explosão da indústria pornográfica, "Garganta Funda" torna-se um fenómeno, em 1972. É o primeiro filme pornográfico com argumento a ser exibido nas salas de cinema, apresentando uma desconhecida e improvável estrela: Linda Lovelace.

programme.title: Drive - Risco Duplo
programme.desc: Driver é um condutor profissional de automóveis de Los Angeles, duplo para produções cinematográficas durante o dia e motorista para bandos de assaltos à mão armada durante a noite. Apesar de ser um solitário por natureza, não consegue deixar de se apaixonar pela sua bela vizinha Irene.

programme.title: Junto ao Mar
programme.desc: França, anos 70. Vanessa, uma antiga bailarina, e Roland, um escritor americano, viajam pelo país até chegarem a uma pequena vila costeira. Aí, o afastamento que existe entre ambos é substituído pela proximidade que sentem com alguns dos habitantes locais.

programme.title: 007: Casino Royale
programme.desc: Para travar Le Chiffre e derrubar uma rede de terroristas, Bond tem de o vencer num jogo de póquer no Casino Royale. Enquanto Bond e Vesper sobrevivem a uma série de ataques letais, uma atração mútua vai crescendo, levando-os a acontecimentos ainda mais perigosos que mudarão a vida dele para sempre.

programme.title: O Caçador e a Rainha do Gelo
programme.desc: Antes de a malvada rainha Ravenna ser derrotada por Branca de Neve, ela e a irmã, Freya, a Rainha do Gelo, estavam em guerra. Freya criou uma legião de mortais caçadores e descobre que os dois melhores desafiaram a sua única regra: manter-se longe do amor.

programme.title: A Modista
programme.desc: Quando Tilly chega a casa, não só se reconcilia com a mãe, mas também com a sua máquina de costura. Recorrendo à sua experiência na alta-costura, Tilly transforma as mulheres da cidade de tal forma que consegue vingar-se de quem antes lhe tinha feito mal.

programme.title: Com Amor, Simon
programme.desc: Simon, um jovem de 17 anos, esconde um grande segredo da sua família, colegas e amigos: é homossexual. No entanto, quando o seu segredo é ameaçado, Simon terá de enfrentar a verdade sobre si próprio e viver o primeiro amor...

programme.title: O Escritor Fantasma
programme.desc: Um escritor bem-sucedido é contratado para concluir a autobiografia de Adam Lang, ex-primeiro ministro britânico, iniciada por um escritor que morreu. O projeto é urgente e presume a sua ida para a ilha onde Lang vive, em isolamento quase total, com a mulher e Amelia, a sua assistente e amante.

programme.title: Intruso Suspeito
programme.desc: Um homem fugido da prisão diz-se vítima de um acidente de viação. Uma mulher, que mora nas redondezas, acaba por deixá-lo entrar em casa para o ajudar. Mas a mulher e a filha acabam sequestradas na sua própria casa, à mercê de uma mente psicopata.

programme.title: Máximo Risco
programme.desc: A investigação de Alain Moreau sobre a morte do seu irmão gémeo leva-o para as ruas de Nova Iorque e para os braços da "cunhada". Perseguido por assassinos russos e ex-agentes do FBI, Moreau bate-se, numa corrida contra o tempo, por desvendar o mistério da morte do seu irmão.

programme.title: Táxi 5
programme.desc: Sylvain Marot é transferido para a Polícia Municipal de Marselha, onde recebe como missão deter o temível "Gangue dos Italianos". Para isso, Marot terá de colaborar com o pior condutor de Marselha, mas o único a poder recuperar o lendário Táxi branco.

programme.title: Encurralada
programme.desc: Liberty Wallace, herdeira e copresidente do maior fabricante de armas americano, está a caminho de um teatro, onde se vai encontrar com o seu amante. No entanto, acaba por ser feita refém e fica em risco de vida.

programme.title: Os Últimos Na Terra
programme.desc: Após uma guerra nuclear, uma jovem mulher sobrevive sozinha, temendo ser a proverbial última mulher na Terra. Mas tudo muda quando tem a visão mais surpreendente da sua vida: outro ser humano.

programme.title: Nascer Para Morrer
programme.desc: Um espião e um ladrão, apesar de rivais, têm de trabalhar juntos para colocar fim a uma guerra no submundo. Esta guerra, desencadeada pelas ambições de um sádico senhor do crime, envolve mortes, raptos e o furto de uma coleção de preciosos diamantes negros.

programme.title: Perseguição Sem Tréguas
programme.desc: Chance é o alvo principal de um perverso mercenário que utiliza veteranos de combate na penúria para entreter os seus clientes. Estes milionários pagam meio milhão de dólares para caçar a presa mais aliciante de todas: O homem.

programme.title: The Nun - A Freira Maldita
programme.desc: Quando uma jovem freira se suicida numa abadia na Roménia, um sacerdote com um passado assombrado e uma noviça no limiar dos votos finais, são enviados pelo Vaticano para investigar este acontecimento. Juntos descobrem o segredo profano da Ordem...

programme.title: Invasão de Privacidade
programme.desc: Um autoproclamado milionário vê a sua vida do avesso, depois de despedir o seu consultor na área da tecnologia...

programme.title: Braveheart - O Desafio do Guerreiro
programme.desc: Finais do século XIII. Devido a uma crise dinástica, a Escócia é integrada na Inglaterra. O rei Eduardo I e a nobreza humilham o país, que dominam com mão de ferro. Wallace lidera um exército de camponeses e patriotas e empurra os ingleses até às fronteiras. O rei envia então a nora para negociar...

programme.title: A Apólice Milionária
programme.desc: Tudo muda para Eva quando recebe o pagamento de um seguro de vida no valor de cinco milhões de dólares, em vez dos esperados cinco mil... Ela e a melhor amiga decidem então pegar no dinheiro e partir para a aventura das suas vidas!

programme.title: Vive
programme.desc: Robin Cavendish tem um futuro risonho pela frente, até que, inesperadamente, fica paralisado devido à pólio quando está em África. Contra os médicos, a mulher leva-o para casa, onde a sua devoção e determinação transcendem as limitações do marido.

programme.title: Encontro em Manhattan
programme.desc: Num hotel luxuoso de Manhattan, um candidato ao Senado apaixona-se por uma criada que se faz passar por uma abonada cliente.

programme.title: Parceiros No Crime
programme.desc: Pronto a executar um golpe, Gabriel encontra um lendário ladrão, que se preparava para o mesmo assalto. Apesar da relutância de Gabriel, Ripley planeia inclui-lo no seu próximo trabalho: o roubo de dois ovos Fabergé, de valor incalculável, do cofre de um revendedor de diamantes.

programme.title: Sempre que Te Vejo
programme.desc: Charlie é um jovem em luto pela morte do irmão. No entanto, o laço entre ambos é tão forte que todas as noites Charlie brinca e fala com o fantasma do irmão. Quando se apaixona, Charlie tem de optar por ficar ou perseguir a sua felicidade.

programme.title: Salva-te Se Puderes
programme.desc: Bennie Chan, um detetive de Hong Kong, está há mais de uma década no encalço de Victor Wong, um senhor do crime. Quando a afilhada de Bennie arranja problemas com uma das organizações de Wong, ele vai ter de encontrar o responsável pela situação.

programme.title: Race: 10 Segundos de Liberdade
programme.desc: Jesse Owens, um atleta negro, compete para se tornar um dos maiores atletas da História. Esta competição lança-o para o grande palco dos Jogos Olímpicos de 1936, onde este vai ter de defrontar a visão de supremacia ariana de Adolf Hitler.

programme.title: Duna
programme.desc: A luta pelo domínio de uma especiaria provoca a luta entre os diversos povos do Espaço. Esta garante a juventude e só se encontra no planeta Arrakis.

programme.title: Fronteira Explosiva
programme.desc: Na tentativa de esquecer o seu passado, Jack aceita trabalho como vigilante na fronteira. No entanto, derrotar os criminosos revela-se uma tarefa árdua.

programme.title: Grimm
Grimm
programme.desc:
Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"}}</script><metacontent="

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Para salvar o pai às portas da morte, o duplo Johnny Blaze vende a alma ao Diabo e afasta-se da amada Roxanne. Anos mais tarde, ele volta a cruzar-se com Roxanne e com o Diabo, que lhe promete a sua liberdade se ele se tornar o amaldiçoado Ghost Rider e cumprir uma missão.

programme.title: Mythica: O Esporo Negro
programme.desc: Marek e companhia enfrentam um novo inimigo sinistro, Kishkumen, empenhado em recuperar o Esporo Negro para o seu mestre Szorlok. Com mapas iguais, Marek e a sua equipa correm atrás do tempo entre terras repletas de criaturas e uma cidade subterrânea há muito abandonada.

programme.title: Grimm
Grimm
programme.desc:
Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Vice - Cidade Sem Regras
programme.desc: Julian Michaels é dono do Vice, um hotel onde os clientes podem fazer o que quiserem com os robôs, que sentem e pensam como humanos. No entanto, quando uma robô se torna consciente e foge, apanha-se num fogo cruzado entre os mercenários de Julian e um polícia que quer fechar o Vice.

A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25","dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

programme.title: O Bibliotecário - Regresso às Minas do Rei Salomão
programme.desc: Quando o mapa para as minas do Rei Salomão, o lugar onde se escondem fabulosos tesouros, é roubado, o bibliotecário vai ter de entrar de novo em ação.

programme.title: Mythica: O Necromante
programme.desc: Quando o seu amigo mais leal é feito refém por Peregus Malister, Marek deve embarcar numa missão corrupta para servir a sua equipa de possíveis heróis. Mas quando a missão os leva para as garras de Szorlok, o seu maior inimigo, Marek deve sacrificar as suas ambições e talvez a sua própria alma...

programme.title: Grimm
Grimm
programme.desc:
Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"}}</script><metacontent="

A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25","dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Norberto Barba, Terrence O'Hara, Eric Laneuville, Aaron Lipstadt, Peter Werner
